name: Rubick
title: Grand Magus
lore: The Grand Magus can steal any spell, turning his enemies' greatest weapons against them.

telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
telekinesis.description: Lifts an enemy into the air and slams them down, stunning them and nearby enemies.

fadeBolt.name: Fade Bolt
fadeBolt.description: Launches a bolt of energy that bounces between enemies, reducing their damage.

arcaneSupremacy.name: Arcane Supremacy
arcaneSupremacy.description: Increases cast range and spell amplification for Rubick.

spellSteal.name: Spell Steal
spellSteal.description: Steals the last spell cast by an enemy hero to use as Rubick's own.
